message.content:
cs.DC, cs.CR, cs.NI, cs.DS, cs.SY

Reasoning: 
- cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing): The paper proposes a novel pipelining model and consensus protocol to achieve high system throughput, which falls under the scope of distributed computing. 
- cs.CR (Cryptography and Security): The paper discusses a provably secure consensus protocol and mentions the importance of security and robustness in blockchain technology. 
- cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture): The paper proposes a hybrid network consisting of a relay network and a peer-to-peer network, and discusses optimization strategies for information propagation and data retrieval. 
- cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms): The paper proposes a game-theoretic relay selection algorithm to optimize the performance of the relay network, which falls under the scope of algorithm design. 
- cs.SY (Systems and Control): The paper discusses the holistic approach of re-innovating all core elements of the blockchain technology (computation, networking, and storage) to achieve the best balance among scalability, security, and decentralization, which falls under the scope of system design and control.
